title: console.css support
body:
This feature would expose console.css(element) to the page which would log a trace styles view of the

Proposed Design
- New API console.css(element) that takes a markup element as a parameter
- Console will display a message "Trace styles <element>" and on the subsequent line the trace styles view (as it is in the trace styles panel) will be logged
- Always returns undefined
- Never throws
